meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>emperor</kanji>'s <kanji>fat</kanji> <kanji>child</kanji> is the <vocabulary>crown prince</vocabulary>, not because he's fat, but because he's the emperor's child.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
